name: Speedroid Marble Machine
desc:
Pendulum Effect
Once per turn, when a Defense Position monster you control is targeted for an attack: Change that monster's battle position, and during this turn, that monster cannot be destroyed by battle.

Monster Effect
When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 “Speedroid” monster from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of the turn, except WIND monsters. You can only use this effect of "Speedroid Marble Machine" once per turn.
